content.title: Case Study: Carlos' Business Survival

timelineSteps.label: Background
timelineSteps.text: Carlos owned a small café that struggled during an economic downturn.

timelineSteps.label: Approach
timelineSteps.text: He started learning about trading to create a new income stream.

timelineSteps.label: Challenge
timelineSteps.text: Carlos made small, careful trades in the evenings after closing his café.

timelineSteps.label: Solution
timelineSteps.text: He faced losses at first, but kept a trading journal and learned from mistakes.

timelineSteps.label: Outcome
timelineSteps.text: Gradually, his trading profits helped cover business expenses.

timelineSteps.label: Lesson
timelineSteps.text: Carlos kept his café open and gained confidence in both business and trading.

content.chartHint: Carlos's trading profits and café revenue (2022-2024)
content.keyTakeawayText: Adaptability and persistence can turn challenges into new opportunities.
